price: Hakika katika hayo zipo ishara kwa waaguzi.
footnotes: Haya yaliyo washukia kaumu Luut'i ni alama wazi ya kuonyesha vipi Mwenyezi Mungu Mtukufu anavyo timiza ahadi yake. Wajuao mambo wanayatambua hayo, na wanayaelewa matokeo yake kwa alama zake, kwani kila kitendo chenye sifa ya ukosefu kina alama yake isiyo potea. Matokeo yake ni mfano wa haya, duniani na Akhera.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
